MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the KA7 postcode area of Ayr.  It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an isolation of Electricity at 11:15am to complete an alteration on our underground cable network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:50am on the 12th of March 2021.
